alert.note: Alert for Chase; Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:55PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Frontier, eastern Chase, southeastern Lincoln and Hayes Counties through 1245 AM CDT/1145 PM MDT/... At 1154 PM CDT/1054 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Enders to near Eustis. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Curtis, Hayes Center, Wauneta, Eustis, Moorefield, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Maywood, Hamlet, Quick, Center Dam Campground, Willow View Campground, Freedom, Hayes Center State Wildlife Management Area, Marengo, Orafino and Area A Campground. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 29 and 48. Highway 83 between mile markers 27 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
